name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf - Armour of the Deathwatch
detailed_description:
‘No matter how well defended the enemy’s sanctum, no matter how elite the warriors that guard it, no site of alien power or worship is safe from the wrath of the Deathwatch.
It is they who bring the Emperor’s cleansing flame, slaying foul xenos warlords and toppling inhuman idols to break the unclean spirit of their foes.’
(Codex Adeptus Astartes Deathwatch)

This DLC will add more than 15 variants of Deathwatch armour visual appearances to the game for all classes of the main character and his squadmates, as well as the ability to turn the display of helmets on or off.
about_the_game:
‘No matter how well defended the enemy’s sanctum, no matter how elite the warriors that guard it, no site of alien power or worship is safe from the wrath of the Deathwatch.
It is they who bring the Emperor’s cleansing flame, slaying foul xenos warlords and toppling inhuman idols to break the unclean spirit of their foes.’
(Codex Adeptus Astartes Deathwatch)

This DLC will add more than 15 variants of Deathwatch armour visual appearances to the game for all classes of the main character and his squadmates, as well as the ability to turn the display of helmets on or off.
short_description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf is a card-driven turn-based tactical game which features RPG elements, containing a single player campaign, survival and PvP modes. Win these battles using the arsenal of weapons, abilities and cunning of the sky warriors.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 compatible GPU is required to play the game! Attempts on launching the game on systems which do not meet minimum requirements will cause crashes! Integrated GPUs may cause significant FPS drops! The game is not fully compatible with legacy AMD Radeon HD Video Cards which don't support DirectX 12!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 compatible GPU is required to play the game! Attempts on launching the game on systems which do not meet minimum requirements will cause crashes! Integrated GPUs may cause significant FPS drops! The game is not fully compatible with legacy AMD Radeon HD Video Cards which don't support DirectX 12!
